sentences.sContent: She wore a string of green glass beads around her neck.
sentences.sCn: 她脖子上戴着一串绿色的玻璃珠子。

sentences.sContent: Beads of sweat trickled down his face.

phrases.pCn: 张力调整杆；拉深压边筋；拉道
堆焊；珠焊；坡口焊；窄焊道焊接

words.tran: 起泡的；饰有珠子的；晶亮如小珠的
形成珠状；[机] 卷边；起泡，起泡剂

remMethod.val: 做面包(bread)的工人汗滴(bead)如雨下

trans.tranOther: one of a set of small, usually round, pieces of glass, wood, plastic etc, that you can put on a string and wear as jewellery
